name: Imerso AS
description: Developer of a building information modeling platform intended to monitor performance and field progress in real-time. The company's platform continuously monitors incoming field data against building plans and alerts about problematic BIM (Building Information Model) deviations using its three-dimensional scanning app, enabling constructors to keep all fieldwork well documented and detect construction errors without delays.
